prop.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to support something by leaning it against something, or by putting something else under, next to, or behind it
prop.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Can we prop the window open with something?
He propped his bike against a tree.
prop.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an object placed under or against something to hold it in a particular position
prop.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a small object such as a book, weapon etc, used by actors in a play or film
prop.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Anna looks after costumes and props.
prop.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: something or someone that helps you to feel strong
prop.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: She was becoming an emotional prop for him.
prop.translation[1].definitions[4].defin: one of the players in a rugby team, who is large and strong and holds up the scrum
